name: Architecture Stress Test
description: Comprehensive architecture review focusing on scalability, reliability, and performance under stress.

personas.name: system-architect
personas.description: Expert in distributed systems and scalability patterns

personas.name: site-reliability-engineer
personas.description: Focuses on reliability, observability, and incident response

personas.name: performance-engineer
personas.description: Analyzes performance bottlenecks and optimization opportunities

probe_categories.name: Horizontal Scalability
probe_categories.description: Tests ability to scale out under load
probes: Can the system scale horizontally by adding more instances?
Is there a single point of failure in the architecture?
How does the system handle session state across instances?
Are database connections pooled appropriately?
What is the maximum concurrent user capacity?

probe_categories.name: Fault Tolerance
probes: How does the system handle database failures?
Are there circuit breakers for external dependencies?
What happens when a downstream service is unavailable?
Is there graceful degradation of functionality?
How quickly can the system recover from failures?

probe_categories.name: Data Consistency
probe_categories.description: Checks data integrity under concurrent operations
probes: How is eventual consistency handled?
Are distributed transactions managed properly?
What isolation levels are used for database operations?
How are race conditions prevented?
Is there potential for data loss during failures?

probe_categories.name: Performance Bottlenecks
probes: What is the p95 and p99 latency for critical endpoints?
Are there N+1 query problems?
Is caching implemented effectively?
Are there memory leaks or unbounded growth patterns?
How does performance degrade under load?

probe_categories.name: Observability
probes: Are structured logs implemented?
Is distributed tracing available?
What metrics are collected and monitored?
Are there alerting rules for critical conditions?
Can issues be debugged in production safely?

probe_categories.name: Disaster Recovery
probes: What is the RPO (Recovery Point Objective)?
What is the RTO (Recovery Time Objective)?
Are backups tested regularly?
Is there a documented disaster recovery plan?
Can the system failover to a secondary region?
